org.kurento.repository

Interface Repository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RepositoryWithHttp
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemRepository, MongoRepository

    public interface Repository
    This interface represents the main interface to interact with a repository of items. In the contexto of Kurento Media Framework, the repository is intended to store media files, but can be used to store any kind of binary content.

    The items are represented as instances of RepositoryItem obtained with methods of this interface. This interface offers several CRUD operations to manage repository items.

      Returns the repository items with value that matches the specified regular expression in the specified attribute of metadata's repository item.

      Returns the repository items with the specified value in the specified attribute of metadata's repository item.

      Removes the specified repository item.

    • Method Detail

      • createRepositoryItem

        RepositoryItem createRepositoryItem()
        Creates a new repository item with an autogenerated unique id.
        Returns:
        the new repository item.

      • createRepositoryItem

        RepositoryItem createRepositoryItem(java.lang.String id)
        Creates a new repository item with the specified id. This id must be unique. If the id is used for another repository item a DuplicateItemException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the new repository item.
        Returns:
        the new repository item.

      • findRepositoryItemById

        RepositoryItem findRepositoryItemById(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the repository item identified by the specified id. The id is unique between repository items.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the repository item that can be returned
        Returns:
        the repository item with the indicated id

      • findRepositoryItemsByAttValue

        java.util.List<RepositoryItem> findRepositoryItemsByAttValue(java.lang.String attribute,
                                                           java.lang.String value)
        Returns the repository items with the specified value in the specified attribute of metadata's repository item.
        Parameters:
        attribute - attribute name of the metadata
        value - expected value in the attribute
        Returns:
        repository items with the specified value in the attribute

      • findRepositoryItemsByAttRegex

        java.util.List<RepositoryItem> findRepositoryItemsByAttRegex(java.lang.String attribute,
                                                           java.lang.String regex)
        Returns the repository items with value that matches the specified regular expression in the specified attribute of metadata's repository item. The regular expression must be formatted with "Perl compatible regular expressions (PCRE)".

        Concrete repository implementations can have specific constraints in the regular expressions. Please consult the documentation for more details.
        Parameters:
        attribute - attribute name of the metadata
        regex - regular expression to match the attribute's value
        Returns:
        repository items with an attribute's value that matches the regular expression

      • remove

        void remove(RepositoryItem item)
        Removes the specified repository item.
        Parameters:
        item - that will be removed.
